title: Combat Tracker Schema
description: Defines the valid configuration for the Year Zero Combat FVTT Combat Tracker.

$schema.title: Schema
$schema.description: Pointer to the schema against which this document should be validated.

color.description: The color to display on the button. Default: 'currentColor'

eventName.description: The name of the socket event to trigger when the button is clicked

icon.description: The icon to display on the button. E.g. 'fa-bolt'

tooltip.description: The tooltip to display on the button

visibility.description: The player the button is visible to. Default: 'all'

sort.description: The order in which to display the combatants. Default: 'ascending'
